Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.
Name of a location. "The Dreamer" being an unnamed male possesive.
Name of a location. "Meru'Xa" is the Kir'Ko language and should not be translated.
Name of a location. "Xivo'Tak" is the Kir'Ko language and should not be translated.
We should compile our findings about these so-called Psi-Fish for Raxonee and her Amazons.
我们应该为洛葛仙妮和亚马逊汇总所谓灵能水母调查结果。
Quest description. "Raxonee Alara" is an Amazon Commander.
The humans wronged us. We will make them pay.
人类错怪了我们。我们定要以血还血。
Quest description. "The humans" refer to the fallen Empire. "We" refers to the player's Kir'Ko empire.
The Archives are under attack! We must retaliate.
档案馆遇袭！我们必须反击。
Quest description. "We" refers to the player's Kir'Ko empire.
Name of a quest. "Herald" refers to the player character who can be either male or female, but is male by default.
Refers to the player Commander, which is gender customizable. Change the name of the quest?

The Kir'Ko swarm has grown restless during your travels. You must gather supplies and still the hunger of the next Kir'Ko generations.[br/][br/] [recommendedcol](Hint: Annex a sector with the special 'Meadows' feature as a province to your starting colony to significantly boost its food income.)[/recommendedcol]
奇尔寇族群会在你外出期间迅速繁殖。你必须收集补给，为那些嗷嗷待哺的奇尔寇族新生儿提供食物。[br/][br/][recommendedcol]（提示：你可以吞并一块具备特殊“牧场”地貌的区域，将其作为初始殖民地的省区，显著提升粮食收益。）[/recommendedcol]
Quest description. "You" refers to the player character and can be male or female.

Shin’Ty’Ru! There is no greater comfort than sinking your carcass into the bog on a misty morning. This planet has much to offer. I can sense a strong Void presence calling my mind, allowing me to reach through the veil and connect with the Harmony Beyond.
Shin’Ty’Ru！在一个大雾的清晨，躺进泥沼，放空身心，夫复何求？这座星球的惊喜不止如此。我可以感应到强烈的虚空召唤，让我穿过迷雾，与远方和声相连接。
Story message. Spoken by the player character. Player character by default is Poz Tk'Nor, a male Kir'Ko, but can be fully customized. Shin'Ty'Ru is Kir'Ko language and should not be translated.

Yet I still fail to understand its bizarre beauty, when black tides start swallowing the echoes of the ancestral dreams. Hatch-brother Kurrash made an early landing to search for the Dream Reader. I feel his mind drawing closer; he must be returning soon.
是的，当暗黑浪潮开始吞没先祖梦境的回声时，我仍然无法领会这种病态美。卵生族的兄弟克拉什提前到达，踏上了寻找解梦者的路途。我能感到他的意念越来越近；他肯定快回来了。
Story message. Spoken by the player character. "Kurrash Da'Yik" is a male Kir'Ko. The Dream Reader is a male Kir'Ko dream guide (glossary).

Until he does, I need to control the urges inside and listen to the will of the swarm. My people are restless. The new hatch has emerged hungrily from their eggs and the cocoons of the previous generation larvae have all been feasted on during the rite of conversion. Now they lust for more. And the colony must provide.
在他回来之前，我需要控制内心的欲念，聆听族群的意愿。我们的人民蠢蠢欲动。新生的卵生族即将破壳而出。在转化仪式中，上一代幼虫卵囊已经被分食殆尽。现在，它们饥肠辘辘。殖民地必须满足它们的胃口。
Story message. Spoken by the player character.

With each new hatch, the colony continues to proliferate. Still there are some of my brethren that know a deeper hunger. An ancient caste that is insatiable and can instill even our own kind with fear when they devour our enemies to strengthen the swarm. They resonate with our growth - and we nurture their appetite.
殖民地的人口随着卵生族的新生不断增长。然而，我有些兄弟见过更可怕的饥饿。这个古老的种族贪得无厌，为了增强自己的族群，它们会将敌人吞噬殆尽，即使这会令我们感到畏惧。它们的存在加快了我们的成长，我们必须填饱它们的肚子。

There are more ancient Kir'Ko waiting to get fed. Push your colony further, so they can still the hunger of the Ravenous.[br/][br/] [recommendedcol](Hint: Build food exploitations in your colony sectors or research 'Nurturing' to cast the 'Preserving the Future' doctrine in order to further increase the food income of your colonies.)[recommendedcol/]
更多的奇尔寇族嗷嗷待哺。进一步发展你的殖民地，帮助它们抵挡住几乎无尽的饥饿。[br/][br/][recommendedcol]（提示：在殖民地区域中建造食物开发点或研究“培育”来发动“保护未来”教义，进一步提升殖民地的粮食收益。）[recommendedcol/]
Quest description. The Ravenous is a monstrous male Kir'Ko unit.
We have some belief that this is where we will find the guidance we need, once we locate the sought one.
我们相信，在我们找到目标后，自然会在这里找到所需指南。
Quest description. "The sought one" means the Dream Reader.

Kurrash has discovered some ruined structures where there are signs of inhabitation. They may lead us to the ancient Dream Reader.[br/][br/][recommendedcol](Hint: This is an exploration quest. Use your scout units or other fast moving units to complete it.)[/recommendedcol]
克拉什发现了一些废墟建筑，并从中看出了居住痕迹。我们根据这些痕迹或许可以找到远古解梦者。[br/][br/][recommendedcol]（提示：这是一个探索任务。使用你的侦察单位或其他快速移动单位来完成任务。）[/recommendedcol]

I have returned, {STR_LeaderName}, old hatch-mate. Shin’Ty’Ru, how I’ve missed the soothing presence of the swarm! It was unmindful of me to scout alone. I will never understand why some of our people are embracing this new-found solitude of the lost hive.
我回来了，{STR_LeaderName}，我的卵生族同胞们。Shin’Ty’Ru，我太想念我的族群了！一个人出外侦察对我来说是一种煎熬。我永远无法理解为什么有些同族能够离开族群独自生活。

Still I fared well on my mission. This planet is a marvel. It speaks to me, sharpens my psionic instincts. Whispers of the Harmony Beyond have guided me to the Dream Reader. In my mind I saw him meditate within a ruined city, where void-tears had fallen from the sky.
我还是放弃了自己的使命。这个星球惊奇无比。它竟然和我说话，强化了我的超级本能。远方和声指引我找到解梦者。我在脑中看到他在一个废墟城市中冥想，任凭虚无之泪从天而降。

(Kurrash extends his mind to you. As he shares his dream you see images of his recent experiences passing by. You notice mountains and rivers, but also the bespoken ruins, where a blurry figure is engulfed in dulcet light. Suddenly a wave of fury and hatred befalls you, washing away the rest of the vision, as the image of a solitary human settlement appears.)
（克拉什用意念向你传达信息。他向你托梦，在梦中，他最近的经历一幕幕从你的眼前闪过。你注意到了山水以及显眼的废墟，其中，柔和的光线笼罩着一个人影。忽然间，一股莫名的愤恨袭上心头，吹散了眼前的光景，一个孤独的人类聚落随之出现在你眼前。）

Krz’Tk Xrrlt Ptkch! Is there any place in this galaxy left without the sack-bleeders? They infest every planet, devour every species crossing their path. Their greed knows no satiation and consumption is their only purpose.
苍天无眼！整个银河系中就没有一处匪徒没有染指的净土？他们荼毒每个星球，吞噬路上的所有物种。他们贪得无厌，吞噬不倦。
Story Message. Speaker: player character. The first sentence is Kir'Ko language and should not be translated. The sack-bleeders are humans (fallen Empire).

And yet we showed them our mandibles and claws. On Cadilus Prime and on so many other liberated worlds. The Kir’Ko Terym were one of the first colonies to rise up and fight. Since then we evolved and grew stronger, while the sack-bleeders withered like the ruins of their empire. When called to war by their herald, the swarm will not hesitate to respond… and prevail.
但是，我们也用反击告诉了他们，我们不是好惹的。在卡迪拉斯普赖姆等自由国度中，奇尔寇特瑞姆部落是第一个揭竿起义的殖民地。自那以后，我们不断发展壮大，而匪徒却如他们的帝国一般，日益式微。只要使者一声令下，奇尔寇族群定会奋不顾身，碾压敌手。
Story Message. Speaker: "Kurrash Da'Yik". Cadilus Prime is the name of a planet. Terym is the name of a Kir'Ko tribe. Herald refers to the player character.

You know my position on this, Kurrash. Last night I revisited the third dream of Kzara Tosh. I was there, on Xa’Kir’Ko, and though my senses were unfocused, I felt that I was home. Then I looked at the night sky and the fateful constellations guarding the secret of our origin, but once again they remained intangible and blurry.
你知道我对此的立场，克拉什，昨夜，我神游卡扎拉·托什第三梦境。我孑然一身，伫立于札奇尔寇，放空身心，仿若身处故乡。我望向夜空，群星璀璨，掩住了我们起源之谜，但他们又是无法触及，无法看清。
Story Message. Speaker: player character. Xa'Kir'Ko is the Kir'Ko homeworld. Kzara Tosh is an important female historic Kir'Ko figure.

Together with the Dream Reader I need to return to this fragment of the vision. With Hatyl Ur’Uk’s guidance I can achieve something greater than finding new hatching grounds for our swarm. We do not belong with the humans. Not in peace and not in war.
与解梦者同行，我需要重返破碎幻境。在哈泰尔·乌鲁克的指引下，我不仅能为我的族群找到了孵化场，还能洞察更多奥秘。我们并不属于人类，无论是在和平时代还是战争时期。
Story Message. Speaker: player character. Hatyl Ur'Uk is a male Kir'Ko commander.
We have found traces of Psynumbra on this planet. We should investigate.
我们在这个星球上发现了赛努布拉的踪迹。我们应该深入调查。
Quest description. Psynumbra is a psionics-based Secret Tech.

This archaic temple complex is calling to you from the Harmony Beyond. You should explore further to find out more.[br/][br/][recommendedcol](Hint: This is an adventure quest. Make sure to bring an army when you move to the target location.)[/recommendedcol]
这座古老庙宇从远方和声召唤你。你应该一探究竟。[br/][br/][recommendedcol]（提示：这是一个冒险任务。移动至目标地点时请确保带上了一支军队。）[/recommendedcol]
(You feel a psionic mind connecting to your own, but have no clue where from.)
（你感应到了一个灵能灵体，但却不知其所踪。）

You bring a dark passenger with you, traveler. A weight burdens you, greater than you can bear alone.[br/][br/]You search for something - what is it? For what reason have you come to this tranquil planet?
有一位暗黑行者与你同行，旅行者。你肩负重担，无法独自承受。[br/][br/]你在找什么？你为何打破这座星球的宁静？
Story Message. Speaker: Hatyl Ur'Uk. "You" refers to the player character.

We are in need of guidance and came here seeking for a wise Dream Reader of our people. We followed the psionic trail of his presence to this planet.[br/][br/](You focus your psionics in an attempt to break the mind link.)
我们需要指引，故前来寻找我们全知全能的解梦者。我们一路追随着他的神踪，来到了这座星球。[br/][br/]（你聚精会神，试图断开心灵连接。）
Story message. Speaker: player character + third person narration in brackets.

(The other Kir'Ko tightens the link between you.)[br/][br/]A Dream Reader? Hmm, perhaps it was the will of the cosmos that brought you here. My hive sense tells me I am the only Dream Reader on this world, but sadly I cannot help you.
（其他奇尔寇加强了你们间的连接。）[br/][br/]解梦者？这个嘛，也许是天意指引你们至此。我的族群本能告诉我，我是当世独一无二的解梦者，但可惜了，我不能帮你。
Story message. Speaker: Hatyl Ur'uk + third person narration in brackets.

You are on a fallacious path. Dark clouds flow through your mind. I am following the Celestian ways and must not seek conflict with the ones that wandered astray. I warn, do not enter the forbidden archives. Only more darkness to find.[br/][br/](The psionic connection is broken, and a sudden silence settles in your mind.)
你走上了错误的道路。你的心里乌云密布。我追随着星神之路，不得与歧途之人起冲突。警告，切勿踏入禁忌档案馆一步。里边尽是不为人知的无边黑暗。[br/][br/]（灵能连接已断开，你的思维得到了片刻的宁静。）
Story message. Speaker: Hatyl Ur'uk + third person narration in brackets. Celestians are an ancient psionic order in search of enlightenment.

Zzir’rok, what a waste! We come all this way to seek Hatyl Ur’Uk, yet he refuses to guide us on our path. He will not swarm with us because we draw on the darker Void. But while he stays silent to our pleas, the Harmony Beyond always answers. I believed its whispers would guide us to the Dream Reader, but I was wrong. The ruins from my vision point to much older knowledge…
奇尔寇，真是浪费时间！我们为了寻找哈泰尔·乌鲁克历经千辛万苦，他却拒绝为我们指引道路。他不会与我们为伍，只因我们与暗黑虚空走得近。虽然他对我们的请求置之不理，但远方的和声有问必答。我曾经以为，跟随着低语，我们就能找到解梦者，但我错了。视界中的废墟一定储藏着更为古老的知识…
Story message. Speaker: Kurrash Da'Yik. "Zzir'rok" is Kir'Ko language and should not be translated.

I came all this way to seek Hatyl Ur’Uk, yet he refuses to guide me on my path. He will not swarm with us because we draw on the darker Void. But while he stays silent to our pleas, the Harmony Beyond always answers. Kurrash believed its whispers guided us to the Dream Reader, but maybe the ruins from his visions were pointing to much older knowledge: the forbidden archives.
我们为了寻找哈泰尔·乌鲁克历经千辛万苦，他却拒绝我们指引道路。他不会与我们为伍，只因我们与暗黑虚空走得近。虽然他对我们的请求置之不理，但远方和声有问必答。克拉什曾经以为，跟随着低语，我们就能找到解梦者，但或许在他视界中的那座废墟储藏着更为古老的知识：禁忌档案馆。

…the forbidden archives! The connection has been growing stronger. I can hear its melodies from afar, feel the pulse of oblivion ripple through my inner fluids. Will the emptiness consume me when I embrace its song? I cannot tell, but there may be no other way…
…禁忌档案馆！连接变强了。我可以听到远方传来的旋律，感受到了湮没之力在我周身血管中奔流。在我沉醉于这首歌时，空虚会把我吞没吗？我不知道，但是我已无路可选…

The connection has been growing stronger. I can hear its melodies from afar, feel the pulse of oblivion ripple through my inner fluids. Will the emptiness consume me when I embrace its song? I cannot tell, but there may be no other way…
连接变强了。我可以听到远方传来的旋律，感受到了湮没之力在我周身血管中奔流。在我沉醉于这首歌时，空虚会把我吞没吗？我不知道，但是我已无路可选…
These structures pulse with dark energy. They feel familiar to us, like whispers of the Void calling from beyond. We must search further, see what lies inside.
这些建筑中涌动着暗黑能量。这种感觉似曾相识，仿若远方飘来的虚空召唤低语。我们必须深入搜索，一探究竟。
The Forbidden Archives touched your mind heavily, just as those you found inside. You must now face your inner-self.
你在探索禁忌档案馆的秘密时，思维也遭到了严重的腐化，你现在必须直面内心的自己。
Quest description. "You" refers to the player character and can be male or female.
Objective tracker. "Yourself" refers to the player character and can be male or female.

This place is daunting and yet inspires me with awe. I can feel the wake of the Void tear at every inch of my body. The voices of the Harmony Beyond are no longer whispering but turned into a chorus, and its anthem proclaims dominion and power.
这个地方令人却步，但恐惧也给了我力量。我可以感受到体内苏醒的虚空之力正在撕扯我每一寸身体。远方和声已不再是低语，而是化为了合唱，宣示着统治与力量。
Lifetimes of suffering. Agony without answers. Turmoil and torment. You cannot escape the past, {STR_LeaderName}. The suffering of your ancestors cannot be forgotten.
苦海无涯，苦寻无果，混乱纠缠，过去阴魂不散，{STR_LeaderName}。先祖之痛永难忘怀。
Story message. Speaker: player character's doppelganger.
The shadows are gone… clarity and peace have taken their place. Was this the Harmony Beyond showing me the path toward balance?
暗影消弭无踪…清明祥和重新笼罩大地。这便是远方和声指引的平衡之道吗？
You are not like you seemed before, {STR_LeaderName}. Many falter when facing their personal fears. You did not. Some of our brethren seek vengeance for the past, but you can still avoid that path.
你变了，{STR_LeaderName}。很多人在恐惧面前畏畏缩缩。你从容自若。我们有些兄弟总是放不下过去的仇恨，总想报仇雪恨，但你还没走上那条道路。
Story Message. Speaker: Hatyl Ur'Uk. (Male Kir'Ko)

I never sought vengeance on Arcadia Caeleste. Our people need to prosper among their own, away from the humans and their greed. I am looking for our ancient home world Xa’Kir’Ko. The third dream of Kzara Tosh… I need to return to its starry sky.
我从未向阿卡迪亚凯勒斯特寻仇。我们的人民需要一个稳定独立的发展环境，远离尘嚣欲望。我正在探寻我们远古时期的家园札奇尔寇。卡扎拉·托什的第三重梦境…我需要重返星罗密布的夜空。
Story message. Speaker: player character. Arcadia Caeleste is a planet.

The constellations of Kzara Tosh are an enigma almost as old as our desire to return to Xa’Kir’Ko. Her dream must be strong in you, if you believe you can succeed where so many others have failed. It is a worthy goal. Still, you must first show the wisdom that is needed in someone who seeks to reunite our people.
卡扎拉·托什星座神秘莫测，古老恒久，正如我们重返札奇尔寇的执念。若你相信自己能达旁人所不能，取得成功，那你一定是深受她的梦想鼓舞。这个目标十分值得实现。然而，首先，你必须展示出凝聚人心的才能。
Story Message. Speaker: Hatyl Ur'Uk. (Male Kir'Ko)

Many of our brethren are still filled with bitterness and hatred. They need to learn that humans come in just as many forms and shapes as we do – and that there are those among them also seeking to heal the scars of our troubled past.
我们不少兄弟饱尝折磨，心中愤恨难平。他们要知道，人类跟我们一样，形形色色，他们中也有人在探索不堪回首过去弥补之道。
Story Message. Speaker: Hatyl Ur'Uk. (Male Kir'Ko)

Talk to Nicole Crustus. She has been walking the Celestian path alongside me and will be your guide on your journey to forgiveness. Recite the Litany of the Thousand Stars, and she will know your intentions.
去找妮可·克拉斯特斯。她与我一同追寻星神之道，她将担任你宽恕之道导师。背诵千星连祷，她会听到你的诉求。
Story Message. Speaker: Hatyl Ur'Uk. Nicole Crustus is a female Vanguard. Litany of the Thousand Stars is a religious text.

Nicole Crustus… a human as my guide? Every Lyn’Gol inside me yells reluctance at this thought. Yet it is Hatyl Ur’Uk’s will, and I came here to follow his words, did I not?[br/][br/]The Harmony Beyond stays silent… then it is settled. I will talk to the human.
妮可·克拉斯特斯…让一个凡人当我导师？我心里一千个不乐意。但是，既然是哈泰尔·乌鲁克的旨意，我就必须遵循，不是吗？[br/][br/]远方和声保持沉默…那就这样。我会跟那个凡人说的。
Story message. Speaker: player character. Lyn'Gol is a Kir'Ko substitute for bodily fibers
Learn to recite the Litany of the Thousand Stars to connect with Nicole Crustus as your spiritual guide.[br/][br/][firecol](Warning: Completing this quest will have consequences!)[/firecol]
学习背诵千星连祷，联系妮可·克拉斯特斯，请她作为你的灵魂向导。[br/][br/][firecol]（警告：完成此任务将产生相应后果！）[/firecol]
A prayer about the 999 mortal sins of Lennick Tenebbres, the Black Emperor.
一首有关黑暗帝皇莱尼科·特勒布瑞斯 999 条滔天大罪的祷词。
Research skill description. Lennick Tenebbres was a male human Emperor.
Nicole Crustus is asking for your cooperation. Let your actions be guided by forgiveness and forge an alliance with her and the human population.
妮可·克拉斯特斯让你配合。让宽恕指引你的一言一行，与她结盟，与人类同行。
{INT_0}/{INT_1} 已与妮可·克拉斯特斯结盟

I recognize the Prayer of the Thousand Stars. So, you were sent by Hatyl Ur’Uk then. I am happy to see you are willing to follow his teachings and leave behind the prejudice that kept our two people apart. For we all meet as equals in the Celestian light.
我听到了千星连祷。所以，是哈泰尔·乌鲁克派你来的。看到你能遵从他的教诲并放下偏见与我们重归于好，我倍感欣慰。毕竟在星神之光的普照下，众生尽皆平等。
Story Message. Speaker: Nicole Crustus. (Female Vanguard)

An easy thing to say when it was your kind that chose who was to stand in the light – and who needed to serve in the shadows. Why are the Kir’Ko the ones that should show their good faith when the dreams of our ancestors keep reminding us of humanity’s cruelty and greed?
你倒是说得轻巧，你的族类可以决定谁处于光明之下，谁必须隐于暗影。为什么奇尔寇可以以正面形象示人，而我们在先祖的梦境中只看到人性的残忍贪婪？

I do not defend the atrocities we humans committed against your race. But will you not agree that their suffering would receive some comfort if they saw us learn from the past’s mistakes? In the end, it is not me who you will need to convince with your actions, {STR_LeaderName}. It is yourself.
我不否认我族类曾对你们施以暴行。但你们在看到们反思过去的错误之后，不会有所慰藉吗？毕竟，你做任何事情，不需要让我信服，{STR_LeaderName}，需要说服的是你自己。
Story Message. Speaker: Nicole Crustus. (Female Vanguard)
You are invited into the Dreamer's Archive to join Hatyl Ur'Uk. This is a defining moment for your swarm and for all Kir'Ko.
你受邀进入梦想家档案馆面见哈泰尔·乌鲁克。这次见面对奇尔寇和你的族群至关重要。

You have shown great wisdom today, my friend. Letting go of anger and hatred requires a lot of trust. And trust is as fragile and in need of care as a hatching larva in a rough winter night.[br/][br/]Come to the Celestian Archives. It is time to revisit the third dream of Kzara Tosh.
我已经领教了你的大智慧，我的朋友。多些信任，消掉怒火，放下仇恨。信任总是稍纵即逝，就像在凛冬寒夜孵化幼虫，需要我们细心呵护。[br/][br/]踏入星神档案馆，是时候重临卡扎拉·托什第三重梦境了。
Story Message. Speaker: Hatyl Ur'Uk. (Male Kir'Ko)

I remember this part of the dream, remember the fuchsia seas glimmering in the distance of the tangly thicket. The sweet odor of nectar dripping from the flowering pods whose soft melody resonates within the center of my inner self.
我对这个梦境有些印象，还记得紫红色海面闪闪发光，远处的灌木丛杂乱纠缠。花蜜从盛放的豆荚花滴落，散发出阵阵甜香，轻柔的滴答，触动了我的心弦。
It is beautiful, isn’t it? I too can feel its presence calling to me through your mind. Now look up to the sky and tell me what you see.
良辰美景，不是吗？通过你的内心，我也感受到了他的召唤。现在，仰望天空，告诉我你之所见。
Story Message. Speaker: Hatyl Ur'Uk. (Male Kir'Ko)
Darkness… and light! A glistering swirl of stars, right before my eyes, but impossible to touch. They seem bright and clear, yet whenever I fix my vision on one of them it eludes my sight.
黑暗…还有光明！群星闪耀，近在眼前，却触不可及。众星闪亮。夜空明朗，但每当我将视线投向某一颗星星，却发现我们之间像是隔了一层雾。

Then take a step back. Relax every compound of your eyes. Instead of searching a single star, look at the constellations, and instead of looking directly at the sky, seek its reflection within the silent waters. Become one with the echo of Kzara Tosh. Embrace her dream, and her truth will reveal itself.
后退一步。眼睛放松。不要只是寻找某一颗星星，着眼整个星座；不要直视夜空，在平静的水面中寻找它的倒影。接受卡扎拉·托什祝福，进入它的梦境，你自能洞悉她的真理。
Story Message. Speaker: Hatyl Ur'Uk. (Male Kir'Ko)

Yes… I can see it now! The mists of my mind are clearing up, the stars and its constellations slowly taking shape.[br/][br/]Xa’Kir’Ko – how much I’ve longed to see your gentle face. Soon your offspring will return.
真的…我可以看到它了！我心中的迷雾正在消散，星星和星座渐渐显露。[br/][br/]札奇尔寇，我日夜期盼，只盼回到你温暖的怀抱。你的子孙后代即将回家。

You have found Celestian Archives on Arcadia Caeleste. You suspect that they contain the knowledge of Xa'Kir'Ko's location, but also know that entering the Archives by force will come at a price.[br/][br/][firecol](Warning: Completing this quest will have consequences!)[/firecol]
你已经在阿卡迪亚凯勒斯特发现了星神档案馆。你怀疑其中藏有札奇尔寇位置的信息，但也明白硬闯档案馆需要付出代价。[br/][br/][firecol]（警告：完成此任务将产生相应后果！）[/firecol]
Swarm Herald {STR_LeaderName}! We have found an ancient temple complex. The air around it seems to be humming with psionic energy, like a soothing presence calming our minds.
奇尔寇使者{STR_LeaderName}！我们找到了一座上古庙宇，四周空气中氤氲着灵能量，让我们心平气和。
Story Message. Speaker: Kir'Ko Hidden (male unit)

That must be one of the mythical Celestian Archives! It is said that inside those archives the clear-minded can find any answers and knowledge he might desire. Yet only very few are allowed to enter these sanctuaries of wisdom, even within the Celestian order.
那一定是其中一座神秘的星神档案馆！据说心灵纯真之人可在其中找到任何答案。但是有权进入这些智慧圣殿的人少之又少，即使星神修会也少有人能进。
Endless knowledge… eternal wisdom… the secret of Xa’Kir’Ko awaits you, {STR_LeaderName}. Just reach out… claim the archives!
无限知识…无尽智慧…札奇尔寇之谜待你揭晓，{STR_LeaderName}。放手一搏…收复档案馆！
Story Message. Speaker: player character's doppelganger.
Those whispers… should I dare to follow their calling? The Harmony Beyond never betrays. Yet intruding into the archives would be no easy task – and a violent one. There would be no turning back.
那些低语…我有胆响应它们的召唤吗？远方和声忠心日月可鉴。但是，硬闯档案馆绝非易事，而且肯定会有死伤。一旦决定，就没有回头路了。
The archives are mine! Such frail defenses are no obstacle for the Kir’Ko Terym and their Swarm Herald!
档案馆是我的！就这点防力，对奇尔寇特瑞姆部落和族群使者而言，无疑是螳臂当车！
With all opposition smashed like maggots, the path to the Celestian Archives is free. Its frail defenses are no obstacle for the Kir’Ko Terym and their Swarm Herald!
随着大军势如破竹，击溃抵抗，通往星神档案馆畅通无阻。就这点防力，对奇尔寇特瑞姆部落和族群使者而言，无疑是螳臂当车！
Strength and dominance… {STR_LeaderName} close. The Celestian order is weak. Channel their suffering… mend the psionic flow of the archives. Bend them to your will!
强者为王…{STR_LeaderName}。星神修会不堪一击。把他们从痛苦中解脱出来吧…修复档案馆灵能量流。击垮它们的意志，让他们乖乖听话！
Story Message. Speaker: player character's doppelganger.

The Celestian spirits keep resisting my grasp, still deny me my answers. I need to focus my inner hatred to tear through the veil and feed them to the hungry voices beyond. They will not stand between the Kir’Ko and our heritage!
星神之灵仍然在抵抗，不愿回答我的问题。我得凝聚心中恨意，穿过迷雾，用它们投喂远方饥饿之声。它们没法阻挡奇尔寇找到我们的遗产！
Finish your search and use your psionic abilities to forcefully retrieve the location of Xa'Kir'Ko from the Celestian Archives.
完成搜索，使用你的灵能，强行在星神档案馆中检索札奇尔寇位置。
Sacrifice the celestian spirits to reach through the veil and connect with the Harmony Beyond.
献祭星神之灵，穿过迷雾，连接远方和声。
Feel the grip of the Abyss.[br/]Hear the screams[br/]In the empty Void[br/]Awaiting your sacrifice.[br/]Glimpse at the Dirge…
感受深渊恐惧。[br/]聆听虚空[br/]呐喊[br/]等待祭品。[br/]窥视挽歌…
…and its echoes beyond the veil.[br/]In the black wake[br/]Resides a gloomy harmony.[br/]From the darkness they come…
…哀恸之声穿越迷雾。[br/]哀歌在暗黑觉醒之地[br/]响起。[br/]它们来自黑暗之地…
Story Message. Speaker: player character's doppelganger.
…and into oblivion we go.[br/]Foreboding the coming[br/]Of another world.[br/][br/]Yes… yes! Xa’Kir’Ko – how much I’ve longed to see your gentle face. Soon your offspring will return.
…我们前往湮没之地。[br/]预知[br/]另一个世界的降临。[br/][br/]是的…没错！札奇尔寇，我日夜期盼，只盼回到你温暖的怀抱。你的子孙后代即将回家。
Sound the alarm! Man the defenses! Troopers! Another wave of bugs is upon us, and we won't go down without a fight!
发警报！防御！骑兵上！另一波怪虫来袭，我们绝不束手就擒！
Story Message. Speaker: Male vanguard trooper
Another wave? More of our brethren must have sought refuge on this planet. Did Hatyl Ur’Uk not come alone? We must focus our senses to detect their presence.
还有一波？我们其他的兄弟一定是去找这个星球上的难民去了。哈泰尔·乌鲁克没来吗？我们必须聚精会神，探测它们的位置。
找到作战中奇尔寇战士

The humans spoke of other Kir'Ko attacking them. You must find them.[br/][br/][recommendedcol](Hint: This is an exploration quest. Use your scout units or other fast moving units to complete it.)[/recommendedcol]
人类传信，另一波奇尔寇正对它们发动袭击。你必须找到他们。[br/][br/][recommendedcol]（提示：这是一个探索任务。使用你的侦察单位或其他快速移动单位来完成任务。）[/recommendedcol]
Quest description. Humans in this case are the Vanguard.
找到好斗的奇尔寇战士

Tik Ji'Glux asks you to take revenge on the humans on Arcadia Caeleste by raiding their settlements and subduing their population. She provided you with the locations of the remaining Vanguard settlements on the planet.[br/][br/][firecol](Warning: Completing this quest will have consequences!)[/firecol]
蒂克·姬古莱士请你袭击阿卡迪亚凯勒斯特的人类，掠夺他们的定居点，征服他们的人民，一雪前耻。她可以告诉你残留先锋定居点在这星球上的位置。[br/][br/][firecol]（警告：完成此任务将产生相应后果！）[/firecol]
Quest description. Tik Ji'Glux is a female Kir'Ko commander.
Hox’Krit’Pat, {STR_LeaderName}! It is good to feel the presence of another Swarm Herald on this world. Have you come to join Tik Ji’Glux in her virtuous campaign against the sack-bleeders?
Hox’Krit’Pat，{STR_LeaderName}！很高兴能在这个星球上看到族群使者。你来此地是为了加入蒂克·姬古莱士，共襄义举，对抗匪徒吗？
Story Message. Speaker: Tik Ji'Glux (female Kir'Ko). Hox'Krit'Pat is Kir'Ko language and should not be translated.

Hox’Krit’Pat, Tik Ji’Glux. The Kir’Ko Terym are dignified by your presence – your victories surrounding the liberation of our people are still echoing throughout the dreams of present Kir’Ko generations. Yet it is Hatyl Ur’Uk who drew us to Arcadia Caeleste. With his help we seek to find our lost home world, Xa’Kir’Ko.
Hox’Krit’Pat，蒂克·姬古莱士。你们为奇尔寇特瑞姆部落解放建下卓越功勋。你们成功解放了我们人民，你们的事迹至今仍在当代奇尔寇人民中传颂。但是，我们来阿卡迪亚凯勒斯特是哈泰尔·乌鲁克的意思。他帮助我们寻找失落家园札奇尔寇。

Xa’Kir’Ko? By Ro’Qwer’Zs horn and tail! You are bold to take that path, {STR_LeaderName}. But that foolish Khaz’Ak of a Dream Reader will be your disappointment. Hatyl Ur’Uk’s mind has withered. He preaches indifference and pacifism, when his voice should be the smiting spark that ignites the sack-bleeder’s purgatory.
札奇尔寇？我的天哪！走这条路，你们真是勇气可嘉，{STR_LeaderName}。但是那个该死的解梦者就是一个蠢货，他肯定让你们很失望。哈泰尔·乌鲁克已经堕落了。他本该用他的声音为匪徒超度，如今，他却在在宣扬冷漠和反战。
Story Message. Speaker: Tik Ji'Glux (female Kir'Ko). Khaz'Ak is a Kir'Ko curseword. Ro'Qwer'Z is a historical male Kir'Ko figure
How can you revile one so respected among our people? With his teachings Hatyl Ur’Uk gave new purpose and direction to many Kir’Ko.
你怎么能如此辱骂我们爱戴万分之人？在他的教导下，哈泰尔·乌鲁克才为许多奇尔寇族人指明了新方向。

Hatyl Ur’Uk may have been great once, but his recent acts are an insult to our ancestors and their suffering. He is cuddling with the sack-bleeders, defiling the memory and dreams of all oppressed Kir’Ko.
也许哈泰尔·乌鲁克曾经伟大过，但他最近的行径简直是对我们先祖和他们所承受苦难的侮辱。他与匪徒狼狈为奸，完全不顾那些匪徒带给所有受压迫奇尔寇族人痛苦的记忆和可怕噩梦。
Story Message. Speaker: Tik Ji'Glux (female Kir'Ko).

I sense their agony channeled through you as well, {STR_LeaderName}. You share the instinctual knowledge that tells any true Kir’Ko to be mindful of the sack-bleeders and strike them with ferocious determination whenever given the chance. Arcadia Caeleste is crawling with sack-bleeders. Unleash your inner hatred! Let them taste the fury of the swarm!
我能从你身上感受到他们的愤恨，{STR_LeaderName}。你也得到了了仇恨匪徒之本能，任何奇尔寇族人须小心匪徒，并抓住任何机会，果决痛击匪徒。阿卡迪亚凯勒斯特中爬满了匪徒。释放你内心的仇恨！让他们好好感受一下族群的冲天怒火！
Story Message. Speaker: Tik Ji'Glux (female Kir'Ko).
You must herd the humans like beasts. Break them completely. Destroy the Vanguard, Paragon and Amazon armies.
你一定像对待畜生一样圈养人类。彻底击垮他们。干掉先锋部队、完人部队和亚马逊部队。
Krkr! The bleeders did their name justice! It is liberating to return the suffering to its creators isn’t it?
苍天有眼！那些匪徒终于遭到报应了！将痛苦回敬给造物主，很解气吧？
Story Message. Speaker: Tik Ji'Glux (female Kir'Ko). Krkr! is phonetic.
Yes! I can feel the Harmony Beyond drawing closer. Every lament and moan they utter adds another note to its powerful symphony.
是的！我可以感受远方和声愈发清晰。他们每声恸哭，每次悲叹，就像一个个音符，让这场交响乐更为雄壮恢弘。
As it should be. Make them crouch down like animals. Herd them to the song of the Kir’Ko. Let the slaves be masters and the masters be slaves!
就该如此。让他们像畜生一样爬行。带他们聆听奇尔寇之歌。让奴隶翻身做主人，主人沦为奴隶！
Story Message. Speaker: Tik Ji'Glux (female Kir'Ko).
The humans are responsible for the suffering of your ancestors. It is time to make them suffer as your people did.
人类曾为你的先祖带来诸多苦难。是时候以牙还牙了。
{INT_0}/{INT_1} 已击败妮可·克拉斯特斯

Through the Harmony Beyond the swarm taught the sack-bleeders the true meaning of dominion! Their minds broke quicker than rotten trees in a slugstorm. They are weak and must bend to the psionic will of the Kir’Ko!
族群借助远方和声，教会了匪徒统治的真正含义！他们的恶念摧枯拉朽。他们不堪一击，必须屈服于奇尔寇神圣意念之下！

Well spoken! From their ashes a new natural order will be born, where the sack-bleeders serve as nurturing shells for our larvae, and the Kir’Ko hive dictates their destiny. Arcadia Caeleste is only the beginning. Crush the remaining opposition! Then you will meet the one that knows human weakness best.
说得好！在他们湮灭飞灰中，全新自然秩序焕然新生，匪徒尸体就作为我们幼虫的培养基，奇尔寇族群掌控它们的命运。阿卡迪亚凯勒斯特只是开始。打败残余反抗力量！然后，你将遇到那个深谙人类弱点的人。
Story Message. Speaker: Tik Ji'Glux (female Kir'Ko).

Wr’lag’Osh! You sundered the chains in your mind and unleashed your full potential! {STR_LeaderName}, you truly are a Herald of the Kir’Ko.[br/][br/]Reap the fruits of your ardent zeal. You are no doubt worthy to lead our people to their ancient home. One day, once the great purge is complete, my swarm will join you there.
可喜可贺！你已经解开了心中的锁链，释放出了全部潜能！{STR_LeaderName}，你的确是一名奇尔寇使者。[br/][br/]收获属于你的热情果实吧。你的确可以引领我的族人归乡。总有一天，在大清洗结束后，我的族群会在那里与你会合。
Story Message. Speaker: Tik Ji'Glux (female Kir'Ko). Wr'Iag'Osh is a Kir'Ko euphoric shout and should not be translated.
Thank you, Tik Ji’Glux, for showing me how to embrace our heritage. Though I do not understand. Xa’Kir’Ko still remains lost, it’s location a forgotten mystery.
谢谢你，蒂克·姬古莱士，教我继承遗训之道。但是我没能理解。札奇尔寇尚未收复，它的唯一依然是个遗忘在历史中的谜。
The Kir’Ko gained a powerful ally. One that was betrayed by the sack-bleeders just like we were and knows more about our past than even the wisest among our Dream Readers.
奇尔寇有了一个强大盟友。他们和我们一样，曾遭匪徒背叛，且比解梦者更了解我们的过去。
Story Message. Speaker: Tik Ji'Glux (female Kir'Ko).
HUMANITY HAD ITS CHANCE TO RULE WITH WISDOM. THEY FAILED. NOW OTHERS TAKE THEIR POSITION. YOU ARE DETERMINED, YOUNG KIR’KO. RECEIVE YOUR REWARD.
人们曾有机会以智治国。但他们没能成功。现在，其他人取而代之。奇尔寇年轻人，你已经下定决心。接受你的奖励。
Story Message. Speaker: CORE (omnipotent planetary genderless AI)

A Dream Crystal with the markings of Kzara Tosh? Her third dream stored and kept as it once was… and I will be the one to relive her memory like the Kir’Ko of old.[br/][br/]Xa’Kir’Ko – how much I’ve longed to see your gentle face. Soon your offspring will return.
带卡扎拉·托什印记的幻梦水晶？她的第三重梦境一如既往地存了下来…我将以奇尔寇前辈为榜样，重现她的记忆。[br/][br/]札奇尔寇，我日夜期盼，只盼回到你温暖的怀抱。你的子孙后代即将回家。
Story Message. Speaker: player character A Dream Crystal is used to store Kir'Ko psionic memory
Green smell. A connection. Home. A sour shape, unlike others… yet similar.
清新的味道。连接。回家了。讨厌的形状，跟其他人不一样…但又大同小异。
Story Message. Speaker: Psifish Psifish are interdimensional creatures, alien to this dimension
I feel the ripples of the Void resonating within you. Yet I don’t recognize their strange, new patterns. What are you?
我感觉到虚空正在你体内汹涌不息。但是，我不认识这种奇怪的新波段。你是谁？
The Void? Home is lost. We are K'Chru. From beyond the veil.
虚空？家园已经陷落。我们是克鲁族，来自迷雾另一侧世界。
Void creatures? This world must seem very strange to you then. We feel with you. The Kir’Ko also lost their home world a long time ago.
虚空生物？这个世界对你们而言一定很新奇。我们也有同感。奇尔寇也是不久之前刚丢掉了家园。
Kir’Ko soothing. Sounds of warm odor. Welcome.
奇尔寇松了口气。温暖的气息。欢迎。
Kir’Ko soothing. Unlike the others we found. They observe. Bland grey smell. Though they look… tasty. Perhaps you want to visit them. Quite close.
奇尔寇松了口气。它们跟我们发现的其它生物不同。它们观察。闻起来是淡灰色。但是看起来…很美味。也许你想去跟它们接触一下。亲密接触。

These Psi-Fish spoke of 'Tasty Ones' that spent a long time silently watching them. You should better investigate.[br/][br/][recommendedcol](Hint: This is an exploration quest. Use your scout units or other fast moving units to complete it.)[/recommendedcol]
这些灵能水母提过这些“美味佳肴”曾长时间悄悄监视过它们。你最好调查一下。[br/][br/][recommendedcol]（提示：这是一个探索任务。使用你的侦察单位或其他快速移动单位来完成任务。）[/recommendedcol]

A Kir’Ko! My huntresses demonstrated keen instincts when they scouted your colony. Though it is not surprising that your race, engineered to adapt to different tasks and environments, did survive the Cataclysm – ethical or not, Terratech Inc. always aimed for perfection.
奇尔寇！我的女猎手在侦察你的殖民地时，直觉异常敏锐。虽然你们这个种族生来就能适应不同的任务和环境，能够在大灾变中通过道德或不道德的手段存活下来也不足为奇，但泰拉科技公司会不断改进的。
Story Message. Speaker: Raxonee Alara (Amazon Female)

Do not mention the name of that accursed company in our presence, human! Murderers! Mutilators! That’s what they are called among my people. When they defiled our Queens there could have been no greater guilt.
凡人，别在我们面前提那家该死的公司！一群杀人犯！一群侩子手！这就是他们在我们族人心中的印象。他们公然反抗我的女皇，已犯下滔天大罪。

Keep your calm, Kir’Ko. You misunderstand. If anything, the adaptive capabilities of your race are an inspiration to the Amazon. When we shape the land, when we tame its different plants and beasts, even when we redesign our own genetic profile, we apply the same principles that make your species excel in so many of nature’s most important disciplines.
别激动，奇尔寇。你会错意了。如有任何不测，你们种族强大的适应能力对亚马逊族大有助益。在我们规划土地，培养植物，驯服野兽，甚至重塑基因序列时，我们都会以你族类深谙自然诸多法则的天赋为参照。
Story Message. Speaker: Raxonee Alara (Amazon Female)

Though there is another lifeform that has recently caught our attention. The Psi-Fish are sentient, psionically-gifted beings, which are as alien and terrifying to us as they are intriguing. Sounds familiar? Then maybe you want to help and act as a mediator? To make sure this particular first contact won’t go wrong.
但是，我们最近在关注另一种生命形式。灵能水母感觉敏锐、天赋卓绝，但对我们而言，他们虽然很吸引人，但是与此同时，他们也是异类，而且看起来很吓人。耳熟吗？你是不是想要提供帮助，担任调停人？确保第一次接触别出岔子。
Story Message. Speaker: Raxonee Alara (Amazon Female)

Only with great reluctance the Kir’Ko Terym agree to reach out in cooperation. Not for your sake or that of your experiments, human, but for the sake of the Psi-Fish, which sound like their fate could be oddly related to our own. They may need our shelter.
奇尔寇特瑞姆部落极不情愿地接受了合作。他们此举不是为了你们或是你们地试验，也不是为了人类，而是为了灵能水母。听起来好像它们的命运与我们奇怪地交织在了一起。他们或许需要我们的庇护。

The days that the Kir’Ko have to take orders from a human are long gone. Your words may smell of nectar this time, but they contain the same malign venom that poisoned hundreds of Kir’Ko generations. We will not aid in the subjugation of another innocent species.
奇尔寇接受人类统治的时代早就过去了。你们虽然满口甜言蜜语，但其中也包含着致命毒药。奇尔寇已经受此荼毒了数百代。我们不会助纣为虐，加害其它无辜种族。
Story Message. Speaker: Raxonee Alara (Amazon Female)

The humans asked you to befriend the local Psi-Fish. You must change your diplomatic state to peace with the Psi-Fish.[br/][br/][recommendedcol](Hint: To increase relations with an NPC Faction, interact with their armies to receive quests or access their Dwelling on the strategic map to make purchases within the faction's dwelling shop.)[/recommendedcol]
人类请你与当地灵能水母交好。你必须变更政治立场，从而与灵能水母交好。[br/][br/][recommendedcol]（提示：要提升与 NPC 阵营的关系，你可以和他们的军队互动以接受任务或前往他们在策略地图上的居住地，在该阵营的居住地商店内购买物品。）[/recommendedcol]
Quest description. The humans in this case are Amazon, which are always female

The Psi-Fish allow you to escort one of their own so that you can observe its growth process.[br/][br/][recommendedcol](Hint: To evolve a unit, it needs to earn combat XP until it reaches Prime rank.[br/][br/]You can acquire more Psi-Fish units with 'Metamorphosis' by completing quests for the Psi-Fish or buying them through the Psi-Fish Dwelling shop.)[/recommendedcol]
灵能水母允许你近距离接触它们中的一员，观察它们的发展史。[br/][br/][recommendedcol]（提示：要升级作战单位，你需要积累战斗经验，直到战斗单位达到精兵军阶。[br/][br/]你可以通过完成灵能水母的任务或是在灵能水母居住地商店购买的方式，来获取更多具备“变形”能力的灵能水母作战单位。）[/recommendedcol]
{INT_0}/{INT_1} 灵能水母作战单位已进化
A soft presence… yellow vibrations… {STR_LeaderName}, what brings you closer?
看起来软软的…黄色振动…{STR_LeaderName}，是谁带你来的？
We seek more knowledge. Your connection with the Void, your biology… there are so many questions! How does your offspring look like? Do you nurture it to grow and prosper?
我们前来向你求取更多知识。你与虚空的连接，你的生物学知识…我带来了十万个为什么！你的子孙后代长什么样？你会哺育他们，抚养他们长大吗？
K'Chru… always hungry. Looking to feed. Take them with you. Come back… if more are needed. Always in search. You help us more…
克鲁族…就是饕餮再世，贪吃无厌。带上它们。如果你还想要更多…随时恭候。探索不息。你对我们的帮助更大…
汇总灵能水母观察成果
You need to compile all of your observations concerning the Psi-Fish and decide which part of this knowledge the Kir'Ko want to share with Raxonee Alara.
你得汇总所有灵能水母相关观察报告，确定其中哪些知识是奇尔寇想向罗克松丽·阿娜拉分享的。
Collected knowledge on the Psi-Fish and their lifecycle.
灵能水母及其生命周期知识汇总。
Curious. The Psi-Fish go through various evolutionary stages, similar to how we go through our larval phase after we hatch. Only, for the Psi-Fish, the journey doesn’t end there.
很有趣。就像我们孵化后后经历幼虫阶段，灵能水母会经历好几种进化阶段。但是，灵能水母跟我们也有不同的地方。它们会一直进化。
All matured… sated for now. Connected with you… stay with you. Stray not.
都成熟了…目前吃饱了。与你相连…与你同在。别走丢了。

Though more instinctual in its purpose, the psionic potential of the Psi-Fish is enormous. They are like aberrations that pour into the physical world through tears in the veil between this reality and the Void. Yet we still only grasp the surface of their existence.
虽然灵能水母过于听从本能，但它们的灵能潜力无穷。它们就像附着于现实世界和虚空间迷雾之泪，误入凡尘。但，对于它们的存在，这只是冰山一角。
To learn more we need to compile our observations. Then we can decide what to share with the humans and what to keep to ourselves.
要深入了解，我们得汇总观察报告，然后决定把哪些信息分享给人类，哪些我们自己留着。

You have successfully made first contact with the Psi-Fish? And you even observed their offspring growing up? Excellent! Apparently the Psi-Fish sustain themselves by drawing energy from the Void and by feeding on the minds of other living beings – fascinating! Well, maybe also disturbing.
你已经成功与灵能水母取得联系了？而且你已经观察到它们的后代的成长过程？干得好！显而易见，灵能水母通过从虚空汲取能量，以其它生命的思维为食。太有趣了！好吧，其实也挺可怕的。
Story Message. Speaker: Raxonee Alara (Amazon Female)

But that is the level of scariness that you have to expect from a Void creature. Yes, the Psi-Fish originate from the Void! My theory is that they were driven out of their natural habitat when the Cataclysm occurred. Since then they have been stranded in this reality, which must be as scary to them as the Void to us, and yet they managed to survive!
但是对于虚空生物，这种恐怖程度你应该有所预计。是的，灵能水母生于虚空！我认为它们在大灾变发生时逃离了自然栖息地。自那以后，它们就困于这个现实中，这里对它们而言，就如虚空于我们那般可怕吧。但是，它们还是活了下来！
Story Message. Speaker: Raxonee Alara (Amazon Female)

If you want to learn more about the Psi-Fish and their psionics, you first need to learn more about the Void. Since you have been of such vital importance for our research, we Amazons would be willing to share our Voidtech technology with you. There are a number of currently unused back-up modules that would be enough to get you started. Interested?
如果你想深入了解灵能水母及其灵能，你首先得深入了解虚空。鉴于你对我们研究的重要性，我们亚马逊族愿意与你分享我们的虚空科技。我们这里有一些当前尚未使用的后被模块，供你上手应该差不多。想试试吗？
Story Message. Speaker: Raxonee Alara (Amazon Female)
Accept [yellow](Adopt Voidtech for the next mission.)[/yellow]
接受[yellow]（下个任务将采用虚空科技。）[/yellow]
拒绝[green]（继续使用赛努布拉秘密科技。）[/green]

A human sharing technology? Is this some trick or scheme? I do not know, but for once my curiosity is stronger than my mistrust. The Psi-Fish carry a strange sense of familiarity with them that urges me to delve deeper, even if it means straying off the natural path. The Kir’Ko Terym accept your offer, Raxonee Alara.
人类共享技术？这是某种骗局或阴谋吗？我不懂，但是我的好奇心战胜了我的猜疑。我对灵能水母种莫名的似曾相识之感，因此，即使背离自然规律，我也要对他们进行深入研究。罗克松丽·阿娜拉，奇尔寇特瑞姆部落接受你的提议。
Story Message. Speaker: player character On accepting the voidtech offer

Where you humans rely on your lifeless technology, we Kir’Ko have our psionic instincts to guide us. For us, there is no need to scan and analyze when our minds can reach through the veil and directly connect with the voices from beyond.
你们人类依赖冷冰冰的技术，我们奇尔寇自有超级本能指引。我们无需借助扫描和分析技术，自然就能穿透迷雾，直接与远端声音交互。
Story Message. Speaker: player character On declining the voidtech offer

You are going astray, {STR_LeaderName}. The path you chose only leads to more darkness. For what you give, you will always receive in return. Remember to pray to the stars when the Celestian light cleanses your soul.
你迷失了方向，{STR_LeaderName}。沿着这条路继续走下去，等着你的只有无边的黑暗。种瓜得瓜，种豆得豆。在星神之光净化你的灵魂之时，记得向众星祈祷。
Story Message. Speaker: Hatyl Ur'Uk (Kir'Ko Male)

You foolish Khaz’Ak! Is that where you lead your swarm, {STR_LeaderName}? Just like the sack-bleeders they now all have to burn in the flames of my fury. Your treachery will be remembered in the dreams of many future hatches, when your ashes have long been scattered on Arcadia Caeleste’s charred remains.
你个蠢货！你把族群带到那里干嘛，{STR_LeaderName}？它们的下场就跟就像那群匪徒一样，在我的怒火里灰飞烟灭。在你们的骨灰飘散到阿卡迪亚凯勒斯特烧焦尸体之上后，后世幼虫仍会在梦里看到你们的背叛，你们必将遗臭万年。
Story Message. Speaker: Tik Ji'Glux (Kir'Ko Female)

The Kir'Ko Terym chose you as their Swarmherald to lead them to a new future. You have come to Arcadia Caeleste to seek guidance and find the right path to lead them on.[br/][br/]Dream Reader found: {INT_0}/{INT_1}
奇尔寇特瑞姆部落选你担任它们的族群使者，带领他们奔向全新未来。你前来阿卡迪亚凯勒斯特寻找指引，探寻正确的领导之道。[br/][br/]解梦者发现：{INT_0}/{INT_1}

Hatyl Ur'Uk seems unwilling to help you. You will have to turn to the Harmony Beyond to look for answers and harvest the knowledge of the Forbidden Archives.[br/][br/]Harmony Beyond Chanelled: {INT_0}/{INT_1}
哈泰尔·乌鲁克似乎不愿意帮你。你得求助远方和声，从他那里寻找答案，求取禁忌档案馆知识。[br/][br/] 远方和声传来：{INT_0}/{INT_1}

Hatyl Ur'Uk is asking you to let go of the past and embrace a new future for the Kir'Ko of peace with their former human oppressors. To this end, you will have to cooperate with Nicole Crustus, a Vanguard following the Celestian Path.[br/][br/]Dream Reader convinced: {INT_0}/{INT_1}
哈泰尔·乌鲁克请求你为了维护奇尔寇和此前人类压迫者的和平，忘掉过去，拥抱未来。为此，你得与星神信徒-先锋妮可·克拉斯特斯合作。[br/][br/] 解梦者坚信：{INT_0}/{INT_1}

Tik Ji'Glux is pursuing the path of retribution. She is convinced that Hatyl Ur'Uk will not be able to help you find the location of Xa'Kir'Ko. Instead she ask you to join her in purging humankind from Arcadia Caeleste.[br/][br/]Humans purged from Arcadia Caeleste: {INT_0}/{INT_1}
蒂克·姬古莱士追寻报复之路。她坚信哈泰尔·乌鲁克不会帮助你寻找札奇尔寇位置，而是请你跟她一起清理阿卡迪亚凯勒斯特上的人类。[br/][br/]清理阿卡迪亚凯勒斯特的人类：{INT_0}/{INT_1}
清理阿卡迪亚凯勒斯特的人类：{INT_0}/{INT_1}

Your scouts have found the Celestian Archives on Arcadia Caeleste. You are convinced they contain the answers you seek, but obtaining them by force will surely come at a price.[br/][br/]Connected to the Void: {INT_0}/{INT_1}
你的侦察兵已经在阿卡迪亚凯勒斯特星球上发现了星神档案馆。你认为其中藏有自己探寻已久的答案，但是，硬闯档案馆得付出代价。[br/][br/]已连接至虚空：{INT_0}/{INT_1}
Revisit the third dream of Kzara Tosh
再临卡扎拉·托什第三重梦境
It is time to find our way once more and connect to our roots.
是时候再次探寻我们自己的路了，是时候搞清楚我们的根源了。
Dearest hive-mate, rest eternally. We must hope your loss is not in vain.
亲爱的同胞，安息吧。希望你们的血不会白流。
Kurrash was a great warrior. We honour him for his service to the Kir'Ko Terym colony.
克拉什是位伟大的战士。他为奇尔寇特瑞姆部落殖民地鞠躬尽瘁，为此，我们向他致以最高的敬意。
His memories will not be lost. His legacy lives on in Kir'Ko prosperity!
他不会被遗忘。奇尔寇的繁荣兴盛永远都有他的一份功劳。
Greetings, Swarm Herald of the Kir’Ko. Do not be alarmed by my presence – we seek no conflict with your people.
奇尔寇族群使者，你好啊。希望我没吓到你。我们不是来找麻烦的。
Story message. Speaker: Nicole Crustus (Female Vanguard)
Grzz kl’tk rsh’nrr! (You create a series of clicking sounds as a response. It is an old Kir’Ko curse, but the sack-bleeder surely won’t understand its meaning...)
Grzz kl’tk rsh’nrr！（你发出一连串嘀嘀声作为回应。这是一种古老的奇尔寇诅咒，匪徒自然听不懂…)
Story message. Speaker: player character + third person narration
I see that you are not willing to talk to us. I sincerely hope you will change your mind and come back to us, before there's any more needless conflict.
看来你不想跟我们说话。我真心希望你能在我们产生更多冲突之前，回心转意，回到我们身边。
Story message. Speaker: Nicole Crustus (Female Vanguard)
The PyrX flames are protecting me, and with fire I shall rocket back to the stars! My campaign against the sack-bleeders isn't over yet, Swarm Herald {STR_LeaderName}. We will meet again some day.
派尔克斯的火焰保护着我，我将利用火焰飞向群星！我与匪徒的战斗还没有结束，族群使者{STR_LeaderName}。总有一天我们会再见的。
Story Message. Speaker: Tik Ji'Glux (Kir'Ko Female)

For centuries the Kir’Ko had to suffer at the hands of our human oppressors. They feared our psionic abilities, feared us because we were different. So they enslaved us, mutilated our ancestors whose tormented memories still echo in the minds of the living. But the Kir’Ko are resilient. We evolved within and without the swarm until we finally broke free from our shackles.

As Swarm Herald of the Kir’Ko Terym I have been chosen to lead my colony to a new place to settle, a new place to call home. This is a heavy burden as we are confronted with our past in every corner of the former Star Union. With the unity of the hive mind gone, different voices have risen among our people. Some are seeking vengeance, while others like me feel that we need to build our own future, away from mankind and human conflicts.

Our search has been fruitless for some time now and the dreams of my ancestors have been growing darker inside of me as a result. I am in need of guidance to understand their meaning and not succumb to the black emptiness they project around me. To this end I have followed the tracks of the fabled Dream Reader Hatyl Ur’Uk to a planet the humans call Arcadia Caeleste.

Arcadia Caeleste lies ahead of us. I can feel it reach out, a soothing presence bringing calm to the turmoil of the swarm. No wonder Hatyl Ur’Uk was drawn here. This may be the place of tranquility we’ve all been longing for.

The dreams of my ancestors pass violently through my mind, evoking a new sense of power within me. I left all past restraints behind and painted the future in scarlet red. With the location of Xa’Kir’Ko rediscovered, there are buzzing times ahead for my people. When we reclaim our heritage, we will reunite as one, a vast swarm hungering to devour anyone foolish enough to stand in its way.

The dreams of my ancestors pass quietly through my mind, filling me with newfound calm. I am at peace with the past and the future glitters in a delightful scarab blue. With the location of Xa’Kir’Ko rediscovered, there are prolific times ahead for my people. Soon we will gaze at its fuchsia seas, listen to its dulcet melodies and absorb its boggy moist, as we tread the paths of our forefathers.
